name: Blocky Adventures
description:
Instructions: 

Use A to move Left, S to move Right, W to jump, MULTIPLAYER: Use arrow keys to move 2nd player

Hotkeys for buttons codes:c, SAVE:v, LOAD:b, Speedrun:n, reset:r

[ChangeLog]

1.2=Codes! Use code RedRules, Blue_Gang, and Blocky to change character

1.3=Level 11! yay

1.4=pop color

1.5=SPEEDRUNS! :)

1.6=save data

1.7 you now don't have to reset the game to use save data :)

1.8=bounce block

1.9=New code, Veryhealthy. use it to become GLaDOS blocky, and new code *Cricket* to become chell blocky

2.0=new level 12, maybe you can learn more about blockylands past

2.1=new level 13, the time machine

2.2=new code: M, use it to become M blocky

2.3=some new stuff in beta version and also a new map

2.4=enemy finished so far

2.5=music for the game

2.6=secret character codes look for em in games that include blocky

2.7=new level

2.8=New blocky texture

2.9=New enemy

3.0=New song

3.1=new level

3.2=new level

3.3=BOSS LEVEL

3.4=use code text_blocky for something cool

3.5=use wakawaka for a pacman skin

3.6=two new levels

3.7=one more level needs a key to win

3.8=multiplayer added switch and play with someone

3.9=level 22

4.0= second boss

4.1 FINAL STROY UPDATE

4.2 The End, Use code The_End for a special surprise
